alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 26 at 5:32PM MDT until March 27 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Locally higher amounts up to 6 inches are possible in locations impacted by any additional lake enhanced precipitation. The most likely locations for this are from far southern Davis County through most of Salt Lake County. Additional snow will hinge on residence time and location of lake enhancement. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible. The Friday morning commute will be impacted, particularly for Davis and Salt Lake Counties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Given the anticipated small-scale, lake enhanced nature of this snowfall, wide ranges in snowfall amounts and associated impacts are expected over short distances.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley
